# Manifest Dragon Heritage, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]])

**Level:** [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 16th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 16]]

**Casting Time:** 1 full round

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** One dragon turtle

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Races of the Dragon (WotC), pg 114

As *[[Manifest Dragon Heritage (Spell)|manifest dragon heritage]]**,* except that you create a dragon turtle.
